name: SilentB
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silent bee
des: Whether you are just learning to read English, teaching someone to read or helping someone recover after a break from reading English, this short an easy skill can help you remember and practice some silent b words . If you answer the problems correctly, reward yourself (or you student) with an apple or a jelly bean.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
